snippet.title: Lazy Sweet Tycoon Cross-Play PC Trailer
snippet.description:
A Cross-Play Clicker where you'll Tap, Hold, and Click your way to become the No.1 CEO in our unique multiplayer contests. As you manage upgrades, jobs, vehicles, staff, your island and its inhabitants, and your powerful research facility.

Available on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1336500/Lazy_Sweet_Tycoon/

IOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/lazy-sweet-tycoon/id1153615526?ls=1

Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sidelesscubestudios.lazysweettycoon
